title: This Target LEGO Kit Builds the Cutest Vintage Accessory (It’s Customizable!)
description: You can actually build three things with it. READ MORE...
author: Olivia Harvey
excerpt: You can actually build three things with it.

All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.Credit: Jonathan Weiss / ShutterstockIf you love collecting, building, and storing LEGO kits as much as you love vintage home decor, then Target has something you just need to see. It’s a LEGO Creator kit that guides you through building a vintage pink typewriter (as well as a LEGO floral arrangement), and it might just be the cutest thing you see all day.“LEGO LOVERS! Have you seen this?” the caption of a recent All Things Target (@allthingstarget) Instagram post reads. “Creator LEGO sets tend to be the only ones I really buy because they’re such a great deal! You get to create (3) unique sets for just $29.99! I saw the pink typewriter and just knew this one had to come home with me!”This is a more whimsical take on LEGO’s typewriter kit that looks like the real thing.The LEGO Creator kit comes with everything you need to build three unique pieces — the typewriter, a keytar, or a flower pot and pen pairing — which means you can build, display, and rebuild to change up your decor whenever you’re in the mood.The kit is for builders ages 8 and up, so you can grab one for yourself or gift the kit to a young LEGO fan in your life.“I’m obsessed with this cuteness!” one Target shopper wrote in their review. “This was so fun to build! You have different sticker options for the story being typed. Easy to put together. Going to display it next to my watering can flower pot. The paper holder moves side to side too!”At that price, and with all the fixings to let your imagination run wild, this LEGO Creator kit is a steal. Pick your kit up from Target today to start building!

Olivia Harvey is a freelance writer and award-winning scriptwriter from outside Boston, Massachusetts. She’s a big fan of scented candles, getting dressed up, and the 2005 film adaptation of Pride and Prejudice starring Keira Knightley. You can make sure she’s doing okay via…read more

published now

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

If you love collecting, building, and storing LEGO kits as much as you love vintage home decor, then Target has something you just need to see. It’s a LEGO Creator kit that guides you through building a vintage pink typewriter (as well as a LEGO floral arrangement), and it might just be the cutest thing you see all day.

“LEGO LOVERS! Have you seen this?” the caption of a recent All Things Target (@allthingstarget) Instagram post reads. “Creator LEGO sets tend to be the only ones I really buy because they’re such a great deal! You get to create (3) unique sets for just $29.99! I saw the pink typewriter and just knew this one had to come home with me!”

This is a more whimsical take on LEGO’s typewriter kit that looks like the real thing.

The LEGO Creator kit comes with everything you need to build three unique pieces — the typewriter, a keytar, or a flower pot and pen pairing — which means you can build, display, and rebuild to change up your decor whenever you’re in the mood.

The kit is for builders ages 8 and up, so you can grab one for yourself or gift the kit to a young LEGO fan in your life.

“I’m obsessed with this cuteness!” one Target shopper wrote in their review. “This was so fun to build! You have different sticker options for the story being typed. Easy to put together. Going to display it next to my watering can flower pot. The paper holder moves side to side too!”

At that price, and with all the fixings to let your imagination run wild, this LEGO Creator kit is a steal. Pick your kit up from Target today to start building!
